targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "_time", "host"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_user" or r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_nice" or r["_field"] == "usage_iowait" or r["_field"] == "usage_guest_nice" or r["_field"] == "usage_guest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.usage_system + r.usage_user + r.usage_nice + r.usage_iowait + r.usage_guest_nice + r.usage_guest}))
  |> rename(columns: {_measurement: "_field"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field }))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "coretemp_package_id_0")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "host", "_start", "_stop", "_field"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with n_cpus: float(v: r.n_cpus)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with load1_percore: r.load1 / r.n_cpus}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "load1", "n_cpus", "host", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "time", "host"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "host", "mode", "fstype", "device", "_field"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "zombies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "time", "host"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_user" or r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_nice" or r["_field"] == "usage_iowait" or r["_field"] == "usage_guest_nice" or r["_field"] == "usage_guest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.usage_system + r.usage_user + r.usage_nice + r.usage_iowait + r.usage_guest_nice + r.usage_guest}))
  |> rename(columns: {_measurement: "_field"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field }))

  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stopped" or r["_field"] == "blocked" or r["_field"] == "dead" or r["_field"] == "idle" or r["_field"] == "running" or r["_field"] == "sleeping" or r["_field"] == "zombies" or r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "paging")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
// Rename slightly to remove filter info
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field }))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load15" or r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with n_cpus: float(v: r.n_cpus)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with load1_percore: r.load1 / r.n_cpus}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with load15_percore: r.load15 / r.n_cpus}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with load5_percore: r.load5 / r.n_cpus}))
   |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "load1", "load15", "load5", "n_cpus", "host", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "in" or r["_field"] == "out")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with out: r.out / (-1.0)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "host", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "host", "_start", "_stop", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${net}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "interface"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with bytes_sent: r.bytes_sent * (-1.0)}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${net}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1y, nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "interface"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with bytes_sent: r.bytes_sent * (-1.0)}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${net}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1mo, nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "interface"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with bytes_sent: r.bytes_sent * (-1.0)}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${net}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> derivative(unit: 7d, nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 7d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "interface"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with bytes_sent: r.bytes_sent * (-1.0)}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${net}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1d, nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "interface"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with bytes_sent: r.bytes_sent * (-1.0)}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "average_response_ms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "url"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "percent_packet_loss")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "url"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "internet_speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "download" or r["_field"] == "upload")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "internet_speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used"  or r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "free")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> last()
  |> toFloat()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "_time", "host"])
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_measurement"], mode:"by")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "health_ok")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "_time", "host"])
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["host", "_measurement"], mode:"by")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_error_rate" or r["_field"] == "seek_error_rate" or r["_field"] == "temp_c" or r["_field"] == "udma_crc_errors")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "_time", "enabled", "host"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_attribute")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "raw_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "${smart_device}")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "_time", "capacity", "enabled", "flags", "power", "host", "device", "serial_no", "model", "wwn"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_bytes" or r["_field"] == "write_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${io_device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "name"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with write_bytes: r.write_bytes / (-1.0)}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "${mount_point}")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "host", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "fstype", "host", "mode", "path"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "inodes_total" or r["_field"] == "inodes_used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "Supermicro")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "${mount_point}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "fstype", "host", "mode", "path"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nvidia_smi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "driver_version" or r["_field"] == "cuda_version" or r["_field"] == "name" or r["_field"] == "uuid")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["pstate", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "compute_mode", "host", "index"])
  |> group(columns: ["name", "uuid"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

options.content:
# TODO

- Read GPU data to show which ones are avalable on the system and how they're doing.
- Check lm-sensor outputs and add graphs for fan speeds.

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
    |> keep(columns: ["name"]) // drop all but this column
    |> rename(columns: {name: "_value"}) // rename to return a _value column
    |> last() // return only one list item per value
    |> group()
list.label: io_device
list.name: io_device
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
    |> keep(columns: ["name"]) // drop all but this column
    |> rename(columns: {name: "_value"}) // rename to return a _value column
    |> last() // return only one list item per value
    |> group()

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] != "") // remove those without "path" tag value
    |> keep(columns: ["path"]) // drop all but this column
    |> rename(columns: {path: "_value"}) // rename to return a _value column
    |> last() // return only one list item per value
    |> group(columns: ["path"]) // group multiple tables into one
list.label: mount_point
list.name: mount_point
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] != "") // remove those without "path" tag value
    |> keep(columns: ["path"]) // drop all but this column
    |> rename(columns: {path: "_value"}) // rename to return a _value column
    |> last() // return only one list item per value
    |> group(columns: ["path"]) // group multiple tables into one

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_attribute")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
    |> keep(columns: ["device"]) // drop all but this column
    |> rename(columns: {device: "_value"}) // rename to return a _value column
    |> last() // return only one list item per value
    |> group()
list.label: smart_device
list.name: smart_device
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_attribute")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
    |> keep(columns: ["device"]) // drop all but this column
    |> rename(columns: {device: "_value"}) // rename to return a _value column
    |> last() // return only one list item per value
    |> group()
